name: Sheet Pan Rainbow Pizza
preparation: In a large bowl, combine mix with water and oil. Form dough into a ball.
Lightly oil 1⁄4 Sheet Pan with olive oil. Using lightly oiled hands or a spatula, gently press dough into pan, filling right to the corners. Bake for 15 min.
Meanwhile, prepare dip. In a bowl stir together yogurt and dip mix.
Dice cucumber, peppers, and avocado into small pieces.
To assemble, spread dip over cooled pizza shell. Arrange veggies on top .
tips: Bake crust and prepare dip; cover and refrigerate overnight. Assemble just before serving.
Swap 3 Onion Dip Mix for your favourite Epicure Dip Mix.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup sliced veggies and 1⁄3 cup dip (1⁄3 cup 2% Greek yogurt + 1 tsp 3 Onion Dip Mix).

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!
